CustomField.description: Use a saved payment method for the customer without having to enter in a new credit card or bank account (not supported for all gateways - check with your administrator to see if you are using a gateway that supports this functionality).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use a saved payment method for the customer without having to enter in a new credit card or bank account (not supported for all gateways - check with your administrator to see if you are using a gateway that supports this functionality).
CustomField.label: Payment Method
